verses.1: Tua laitakin Jerusalem panin a hong pai Farisi mite le Thukham hilh siate, Jesu kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.
verses.2: A nungzuite pawl khat in khanglui ngeina zui loin, khut sil loin an a neklam uh a mu kha uh hi.
verses.3: (Farisi mite le Jew mite khempeuh in khanglui ngeina zui-in khut sil loin an ne lo uh hi.
verses.4: Nek theih zuakna panin a kilei nate zong amau teek mah in a sawp kei uh leh ne lo uh hi. Khanglui ngeina a zuih uh, hai khawng, beel khawng, sumngo kibawl beellekuang khawngte sawp ding cih ngeina a zuih uh tampi om hi.)
verses.5: Tua ahih manin Farisi mite le Thukham hilh siate in Jesu kiangah, “Bang hangin na nungzuite in, khanglui lai pek panin tu ni dongin a kizui pulepa ngeinate zui loin, khut sil loin an ne ahi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
verses.6: Jesu in amaute dawng a, “A tungtham a hoihin a kilang khem noteʼ thu, Isaiah in a gen kholhna man mahmah hi. Ama genna ah, ‘Pasian in hih bangin gen hi: Hih mite in a kampi bek uh tawh kei hong zahtak bawl uh a, a lungsim taktak uh kei tawh kigamla hi.
verses.7: Mihingteʼ bawl tawm thukhamte, Pasianʼ thukham zahin mite tungah hilh uh ahih manin, kei hong biak hangun a kimanna om lo hi,’ ci hi.
verses.8: Note in Pasianʼ thukham nawl khinin, mihingteʼ thuhilhna na zui zawsop uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin Jesu in a thugen zom lai a, “Na khanglui ngeina uh na zuih theih nadingun Pasianʼ thukhamte a nawl khin zia na siam mahmah uh hi.
verses.10: Moses in, ‘Na nu le na pa zahtak un. A nu a pa a samsiate kithat hen,’ ci hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin note in, ‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu a pa a piak theih ding na khat peuhpeuh a neih hangin, hih pen Korban (Pasian ading) hi, ci peuh leh,
verses.12: a nu le a pa a huh nading panin suakta thei hi,’ ci-in thu na hilh uh hi.
verses.13: Hih bang danin mite thu na hilhna uh tawh Pasianʼ thu na pampaih uh hi. Hih bangzia-in na gamtatna uh a dang tampi zong om lai hi,” a ci hi.
verses.14: Tua ciangin Jesu in mihonpite samin amaute kiangah, “Mi khempeuh aw, ka thugen hong ngai unla, ka thugente thei tel un.
verses.15: A pualam panin mite sungah tumin mi a ninsak thei bangmah om lo hi. Ahi zongin mite sung panin a pusuak khiate in mi ninsak thei hi.
verses.16: (Zak nading bil a neite in hih thu za ta un,” a ci hi.)
verses.17: Mihonpite nusia-in inn sungah a lut khit ciangin a nungzuite in hih thu gentehna thu a dong uh hi.
verses.18: Jesu in, “Note in zong bangmah a thei lo hi mawk hi lo na hi uh hiam? A pualam panin mite sungah a tum nate in mi ninsak thei lo hi.
verses.19: A lungsimah tum loin a gil sung bekah tum ahih manin tua panin kitha khia lel hi. (Hih bang a gen ciangin an khempeuh nek dingin a siangtho ahi hi, ci-in Jesu in a gen ahi hi.)
verses.20: Mihingte sung panin a pusuak khiate in mihing ninsak hi.
verses.21: Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingteʼ lungsim sung panin nungak tangval mawhnopna, guktaakna, mi thahna, zilepasal nei sate tawh mawhnopna,
verses.22: huaihamna, gitlohna, khemna, gamtat hoih lohna, enna, mi gensiatna, kisialhna le hai tatna a piangsak thei ngaihsutna hoih lote khempeuh,
verses.23: mihingte sung panin pusuakin mite ninsak ahih lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.24: Tua lai panin Jesu ding khia-in Taia khua kiim gamah a pai hi. Inn khat sungah lut a, kuamah in a theih loh ding a ut hangin a busim thei kei hi.
verses.25: A tanu dawi a vei nupi khat in Jesuʼ thu a zak ciangin hong pai-in ama khe phung ah hong bok hi.
verses.26: Tua nupi pen Grik mi hi a, Syria gam Foenisia khua-a a suak ahi hi. A tanu sung panin dawi a hawl khiatsak nadingin a hong thum hi.
verses.27: Ahih hangin Jesu in, “Naupangte an nesak masa ni. Naupangteʼ nek ding kimlai ui khawite piak masak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.28: Ahi zongin nupi in, “Hi mah hi, Topa aw; sabuai nuai-a uite in naupangteʼ khamval teng ngah buang hi lo ahi hiam?” a cih ciangin,
verses.29: Jesu in nupi kiangah, “Hih banga na kampauna hangin na inn ah ciah ta in; na tanu sung panin dawi a paikhia zo hi,” a ci hi.
verses.30: Amah zong a inn ah ciah pah a, a tanu nuam takin lum hithiatin a om mu ahih manin dawi a paikhiat khitna thu a thei hi.
verses.31: Tua ciangin Taia khua kiim gam panin Jesu paikhia a, Sidon khuapi nawkin pai a, Khuapi Sawmte gam lam tawnin Galilee Tuili ah a tung hi.
verses.32: Mi pawl khat in a bilngongin a pau thei lo mi khat, Jesu kiangah hong paipih uh a, ama tungah a khut a ngaksak nadingin a thum uh hi.
verses.33: Jesu in zong mihonte omna panin tua mipa paikhiatpih a, a mipaʼ bil tegel sungah a khutmete guang a, tua ciangin a khutmete cil nuhin a leii lawnsakin
verses.34: vantung lam en to a, khuisa-in, “Kihong in,” a cihnopna ahi “ Effatha” a ci hi.
verses.35: Thakhatin a mipaʼ bil kihongin, a leii zong hong kol a, nuam takin a pau thei hi.
verses.36: Kuama kiangah hih thute a gen loh nadingun Jesu in kham a, ahi zongin nak kham le nak gen semsem zawsop uh hi.
verses.37: Amaute in gen zawh loh dongin lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih mipa in sep theih loh bangmah nei lo hi. Bilngongte nangawn khua zasak thei a, a pau thei lote nangawn pau theisak hi,” a ci uh hi.
